name: Life is a Struggle
description:
Instruction:

1. Press space to jump

2. Try to survive until age 100

3. A higher degree will help you make more money to survive

4. No money, no life

5. You will have chances to meet girls, but not all of them are your true love

6. Two things you won't like: the thief or your manager 

/\___/\ ( o o ) ( =^= ) ( ) ( ) ( )))))))))))

My first game and I'm still a beginner of game making. All images and the audio are found from the Google. If there is any copyright infringement, please contact me.

The Audio credits to the Youtuber: JubyPhonic

 link: www.youtube.com/watch?v=6eh39VWPIj4
